titleStmt.title: The sence of the House or the opinion of some Lords and Commons, concerning the Londoners petition for peace.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by Leonard Lichfield; printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: A Royalist satire, giving pretended reasons of various Lords and M.P.s for rejecting the idea of peace (Madan).
"This appears to be a London counterfeit, though in the absence of ornaments it is difficult to be sure."--Madan.
